thread.title: Kotoko's defeat to MC El Eulma was the most painful of the season -Opoku Nti
thread.title_full: Kotoko's defeat to MC El Eulma was the most painful of the season -Opoku Nti

title: Kotoko's defeat to MC El Eulma was the most painful of the season -Opoku Nti
text:
Sports News | 17 October 2015 23:25 CET Kotoko's defeat to MC El Eulma was the most painful of the season -Opoku Nti Kotoko and El Eulma 
By: Sheikh Tophic Sienu @desheikh1 on twitter 
Opoku Nti has disclosed that the 2-1 defeat suffered by Asante Kotoko at the hands of Algerian side MC El Eulma in the CAF Champions League was the most painful for the Reds in the 2014/15 season. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us The importanance of History is it's flow and as it flows it carries to the shores of reality. By: FRANCIS TAWIAH -->D
